title: The Necessity of Atheism
description: This short treatise on atheism was published by poet Romantic poet Percy Bysshe Shelley (1792-1822) when he was a student at University College, Oxford. Shelley was expelled for refusing to deny authorship of the work, which the university authorities found shocking.This version was a public domain book, accessed through FeedBooks.
author: Percy Bysshe Shelley
